author: USA TODAY, USA TODAY
title: Feeling alone?
description: We've partnered with P&G to get more people involved in the #DistanceDance party happening across the country. Share your own #DistanceDance video and hashtag your state’s name and #DistanceDance for a chance to be featured.\n\nStay home. Do a dance. Share it…
content:
Stay home. Do a dance. Share it to tell your community you're staying home.
Post your #DistanceDance video on TikTok, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram or YouTube with #distancedance #(the state where you live) and we may feature it on usatoday.com.
